column1: '''George William Tolkien''' ([[20 October]] [[1784]] - [[1 June]] [[1840]]), son of [[John Benjamin Tolkien (George's father)
column2: John Benjamin Tolkien]] and [[Mary Wall]], was J.R.R. Tolkien's great-grandfather.

column1: George was married to [[Eliza Lydia Murrell]] ([[1787]] - [[1863]]).
